About Me

How I got here..

BIO

A fine arts graduate who got bored (BFA - Graphic Imaging, University of New Orleans, 2014). Full scholarship recipient for artistic merit.

I completed an advanced software enginnering immersive program and became certified in Fundamentals of Javascript, Functional Programming, and Web Development (Operation Spark, 2019).

As a software developer, I utilize my design trainning everday. I turn the canvas upside down, look at all the angles, and play with new mediums.

Mumms Software

Fullstack Developer

Software as a service for hospice care workers nationwide. Led the development and release of an assistive scheduling microservice. Standardized CSS and built a custom theme switcher. Prototyped interactive designs with Sketch and InVision. Deployed to production on OpenShift Kubernetes. Tech stack: Java, AngularJS, React, CSS

InSight

Fullstack Developer

New Orleans Food Cooperative

Assistant General Manager

Resolved issues and maintained store's Ubuntu Point of Sales system and WordPress, personally and with vendor relations Managed budget implementations, employee reviews, training, schedules, and contract negotiations
